txt.en: 'If you should find yourself out amid the Mouths of the Entwash, perhaps you might gather some Entscloak for me? It is of no great consequence, but the leaves of the plant work wonders for the aches of the old, such as myself and Lady Gl√°nhar.\n\n'I will find a way to thank you for your trouble, if you did bring me some.'
You should bring the Entscloak you gathered back to Narvellon in Ost Rimmon.
'Entscloak? Indeed it is! You have my thanks, [placeholder]. My gratitude and thanks!'
You should gather Entscloak in the Mouths of the Entwash for Narvellon.
The leaves of the Entscloak plant eases the pains of the elderly and Narvellon has requested aid in procuring some for himself and others.
